en.main-header-sub: The only way I know how to upload files now
en.dashboard-login-paragraph: Please provide your key to access the user dashboard.
en.dashboard-upload-paragraph: If you are the homie that doesn't have ShareX or doesn't want to use it.
en.dashboard-ratio-paragraph: Ratio does not affect anything, it's just for cosmetic, for now at least.
en.dashboard-invite-paragraph: You can invite new users to the service! Please choose carefully who you invite!
en.dashboard-invite-sub-paragraph: Please only invite people you trust, that aren't too controversial :)
en.dashboard-invite-unavailable-paragraph: You do not have access to invites :(
en.dashboard-users-paragraph: You can manipulate users' profiles! This is a big responsibility to take.
en.dashboard-users-unavailable: You do not have access to user management :(
en.faq-a1: This is a file hosting service, like Google Drive, or MEGAnz. We've made it [Open Source] on September 19, 2023.
en.faq-q2: I found my copyrighted material hosted on your servers
en.faq-a2: Contact us at me@reze.moe with subject including [DMCA] before the request. Include original material, license or any other proof of ownership and links to hosted materials on our resource.
en.faq-a3: Previously, this service was hosted on several different domains, but now we've stuck with uwu.so as the main one. Some users have their own custom domains linked as mirrors.
en.faq-q4: Where do you host the service?
en.faq-a4: Short answer: You probably can't get access for now. This service is hosted for friends by friends and is invite-only. If we don't know you, you will never get access to uploading. You are free to browse though.
en.faq-a5: If you have access to the service, you can use [Our open API] to create tools. API has no rate limit, but use common sense.
en.faq-q5: Can I create applications for this?
en.faq-a6: Feel free to message one of the maintainers.
en.faq-a7: Feel free to message one of the maintainers. If you have uploaded a lot of files recently you might've gotten automatically banned for spam, this ban is temporary, so wait at least 10 minutes before messaging.
en.faq-q8: Is there a file size limit?
en.faq-a9: We do maintenance every so often and server reboots every morning, if you want stability donate to [@NekoPavel's] basement funds.
en.faq-q9: Why is this service down sometimes?
en.faq-q10: Why my link does not include my username anymore?
en.faq-a10: We changed how URLs work. Your username is still is in the link, it's just encoded. If you wish to have your username visible, you can add ?useLegacyStyling=1 to your custom uploader URL.
en.setup-paragraph: To setup the file uploader using ShareX, you'll need to download ShareX file in your dashboard, on the top right and import it.
en.setup-step3: Select as custom uploader for everything
en.setup-step3-1: If you've downloaded it not through a dashboard, enter your key in Authorization header field.
en.setup-enjoy: After these steps you should be all done and ready to upload files on here!
en.setup-chatterino: If you want to use with Chatterino, just copy fields from ShareX.
en.banned-paragraph: Your account has been banned from accessing this service by one of the administrators.
